interestingcomments.content: I was recently offered to be put on a waiting list for SL2 so it would seem it is in the foreseeable future so Leica still has the foot on the gas pedal. When I asked about S3 I was told prototypes have been recalled and there is no talk of a newer one anytime soon. We are in a tough market for camera sales and the curve appears to have more room to fall before it hits bottom. Not the best of times to introduce a 20,000+ camera.
